      • getGlobalSessionCounter

        public AtomicInteger getGlobalSessionCounter()
        Gets the global session counter object. Every session in the JVM is responsible for ticking up this object and getting a unique connection counter for itself for use in autogenerated clientnames.
        Returns:
        result
